alert.note: Alert for Kittson; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:48PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marshall and southeastern Kittson Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 248 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Englund, or 34 miles northwest of Thief River Falls, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Englund and Florian around 255 PM CDT. Karlstad around 310 PM CDT. Strandquist around 315 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
